name: In The Dark (itch) (MrKnd94)
description:
A rage platformer featuring Bob McStevie! 

Save regularly. This is because you might fall off and can't get back up. This is the easiest way to win. 

There's also an ending! If you get it, then you are a great player. 

Instructions 

W, Space, I or up arrow to jump. 

AD, JL or left and right arrow to move. 

S to save. 

GameJolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/itd/361049
